name: Gravity Blob (PAPERMOON_SO)
description:
This is my entry for Mini Jam 107, where the required limitation was "gravity is under your control". If you run into slowdown on the web player, you can try one of the native binaries below (or the .tic file if you have TIC-80).

Default controls (assuming keyboard or Xbox controller):

KeyboardXboxActionArrow keys
D-pad/Left analog stick
Move left/right
Z key
A button
JumpX key
B button
Switch gravity
A key
X button
Shoot

You can configure these controls by pressing the Escape key, then navigating to "options", then "setup gamepad".
